isVerbose

public boolean isVerbose
Client verbosity flag. When it's set to true, the client will dump API calls for debug purpose.

decode

public Captcha decode(byte[] img,
                      int timeout)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      Exception,
                      java.lang.InterruptedException
Tries to solve a CAPTCHA by uploading it and polling for its status and text with arbitrary timeout.

Parameters:
img - CAPTCHA image byte vector
timeout - Solving timeout (in seconds)
Returns:
CAPTCHA object if uploaded and correctly solved, null otherwise
